snippet.title: Afterthought - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Afterthought officially launches on Steam on August 1st 2022. That was 7 years of work. Let's hope it was worth it.

Get our Game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/14...
Site: http://www.studiomoondowner.com
Get our Soundtrack: https://studiomoondowner.bandcamp.com


Learn to finish the levels with ease, while experimenting with different playstyles. Explore the movement system of Afterthought, which is easy to learn but extremely hard to master. As Black, you can delve into surreal and beautiful worlds.


Follow Studio Moondowner: 
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/@SMoondowner
Website: http://www.studiomoondowner.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/StudioMoondo...


The production of Afterthought has been supported by FFF Bayern.

#speedrun #afterthought #afterthoughtgame #steamnextfest #studiomoondowner #moondowner #shorts
